channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hybrid Black Friday. The Effect Of Agency Decay And Hyper-Personalized AI

item.title: Feds Warn Safari, Chrome And Edge Users—Do Not Buy From These Websites
item.description: Serious Black Friday and Cyber Monday warning issued for tens of millions of U.S. shoppers.

item.title: Takenobu Mitsuyoshi On His Game Music Career And Iconic Game Over Jingle

item.title: ‘God Of Chaos’ Stars Revealed In NASA’s Jaw-Dropping New Image
item.description: NASA’s Webb Telescope has revealed four spiralling dust shells around a rare triple-star system named after the "God of Chaos," Apep.

item.title: Apple Update Warning For All iPhone 17, 16 And 15 Users—Act Now
item.description: Your iPhone is at risk from attackers until you make this change — what you need to do.
